text:
The UK will lengthen the time in b/w #COVID19 #vaccine doses to as much as 3️⃣ mos (vs. the research-based 1️⃣ mo) + allow the 2nd dose to be from a different company than the first if supplies are limited. None of this is based on research from trials.

📰: https://t.co/Np1jAIhya0 https://t.co/FexQewO3HE
